title: Zooey Deschanel is every inch the adoring mother as she carries her tired daughter Elsie
text:
Actress Zooey Deschanel took her daughter for a play date in the park on Thursday afternoon.

The 39 year old New Girl star was spotted leaving a Venice Beach park with her four year old daughter Elsie Otter Pechenik.

The youngster was seemingly quite tired, as the actress was carrying her daughter to their vehicle after the park outing.

Park date: Actress Zooey Deschanel took her daughter for a play date in the park on Thursday afternoon

Deschanel was wearing a navy blue button down top with green pants for her park outing with Elsie.

She had a blue purse slung over her shoulder with her phone attached to a black strap around her other shoulder.

She completed her look with a pair of gold hoop earrings and navy blue low top shoes as he headed to her vehicle.

Zooey's look: Deschanel was wearing a navy blue button down top with green pants for her park outing with Elsie

Elise is Deschanel's oldest child with her ex-husband, film producer Jacob Pechenik, who she was married to from June 2015 to September 2019.

Deschanel also has two year old Charlie Wolf Pechenik with her ex-husband.

Shortly after the split, Deschanel was spotted with Property Brothers star Jonathan Scott, and they're currently dating.

Karaoke: The pair was also spotted filming Carpool Karaoke with her sister Emily Deschanel and Scott's brother Drew Scott

Deschanel and Scott were both spotted holding hands in the Silver Lake area of Los Angeles in September, shortly after Deschanel's split was announced.

The pair was also spotted filming Carpool Karaoke with her sister Emily Deschanel and Scott's brother Drew Scott.

In September, Deschanel and Scott were spotted in the audience during a taping of Dancing With the Stars.

A source from US Weekly stated that they were seen whispering to each other throughout the show.

'Jonathan moved his chair closer to Zooey and put his arm around her as he whispered closely in her ear,' a source said.

'They appeared very comfortable together and looked sweet,' the source added.

Dancing: In September, Deschanel and Scott were spotted in the audience during a taping of Dancing With the Stars
description: Actress Zooey Deschanel took her daughter for a play date in the park on Thursday afternoon. The 39 year old New Girl star was spotted leaving a Venice Beach park with her four year old daughter.
